author: markekraus
body: My Bad... the tests I had in #4479 were failing in the nightly. This fixes them and now they now pass and fail for the right reasons.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @markekraus I have pushed an empty commit to execute the feature tests.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan Thank you. I will make sure to do this in the future.
